original_text:
You shall eat the fruit of the labor of your hands;
    you shall be blessed, and it shall be well with you.
korean_text: 네가 네 손이 수고한 대로 먹을 것이라 네가 복되고 형통하리로다

sentences.original_text: You shall eat the fruit of the labor of your hands
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 손의 수고한 열매를 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: it shall be well with you
